module TxsHappy
txsParser :: [Token] -> (Id, TxsDefs, Sigs VarId)

prefoffsParser :: [Token] -> (Id, Set Offer)
vexprParser :: [Token] -> (Id, ValExpr VarId)

valdefsParser :: [Token] -> (Id, VEnv)
